column2: "The cuties on the ARKS Ship are evaluating the value of the black cat...?"
"I do not partake in personal conversations during my mission. Excuse me. "
"...I will, however, emphasize one thing..."
"I'd really quite like it to stop screaming \"Hey lady, step on me will you meeeoooowwww!\" every time I walk by."
"That's it. Now, I am on a mission, so I must leave you. "
"How were the Practice Quests from the ARKS Training Center?"

"各クラスの基本的な立ち回りや
フォトンアーツやテクニックの
使い方などの確認ができます。"

"それぞれの練習クエストは
何度でも挑戦可能ですので
心行くまでお試しください。"
"I look forward to seeing whatever you prepare against enemies."
"I'm working at the moment, so I try to avoid non-mission related conversations. Excuse me. "
"I'm working at the moment, so I try to avoid non-mission related conversations. Excuse me. "
"We try to keep ARKS regulations as relaxed and flexible as possible. We want ARKS to be an inviting endeavor."
"On the other hand, there are strict requirements for developing your abilities, and you must put in a lot of work to make progress. A type of candy and a whip. "
"We try to keep ARKS regulations as relaxed and flexible as possible. We want ARKS to be an inviting endeavor."
"On the other hand, there are strict requirements for developing your abilities, and you must put in a lot of work to make progress. A type of candy and a whip. "
"We try to keep ARKS regulations as relaxed and flexible as possible. We want ARKS to be an inviting endeavor."
"On the other hand, there are strict requirements for developing your abilities, and you must put in a lot of work to make progress. A type of candy and a whip. "
"The Council serve as model ARKS members, but they are selected based on their abilities alone."
"Combat ability alone doesn't make the best role models, after all. We have only been set up for some 40 years or so. There are quite a lot of young people still in the current generation."
"We at least, as officers, must conduct ourselves with discipline and decorum. That is what our position calls for."
"The Council serve as model ARKS members, but they are selected based on their abilities alone."
"Combat ability alone doesn't make the best role models, after all. We have only been set up for some 40 years or so. There are quite a lot of young people still in the current generation."
"We at least, as officers, must conduct ourselves with discipline and decorum. That is what our position calls for."
"The Council serve as model ARKS members, but they are selected based on their abilities alone."
"Combat ability alone doesn't make the best role models, after all. We have only been set up for some 40 years or so. There are quite a lot of young people still in the current generation."
"We at least, as officers, must conduct ourselves with discipline and decorum. That is what our position calls for."
"When it comes to Dark Falz, I don't hold much information either. "
"So I wouldn't be able to answer any questions you may have. ...my humble apologies. "
"When it comes to Dark Falz, I don't hold much information either. "
"So I wouldn't be able to answer any questions you may have. ...my humble apologies. "
"It seems that there have been numerous tournaments like the Battle Championship that were held in the past."
"Though as far as the rules are concerned, they were different for each one. So they're not really good reference points. "
"The back up force for ARKS are evolving daily. I think it helps a great deal."

"I really wish they'd hurry and recruit some more. But keeping security in mind, this pace is best.
...I can't do much about it, but I do apologize. "
"The back up force for ARKS are evolving daily. We're talking new classes and new skills. "

"I really wish they'd hurry and recruit some more. But keeping security in mind, this pace is best.
...I can't do much about it, but I do apologize. "
"The back up force for ARKS are evolving daily. We're talking new classes and new skills. "

"I really wish they'd hurry and recruit some more. But keeping security in mind, this pace is best.
...I can't do much about it, but I do apologize. "
"The skill sets of individual ARKS members are growing exponentially. "
"To have an increased number of skilled members is something to be celebrated as an organization. "
"It's too sweet a story to not leave one behind, but we endeavor to get as close to this as possible. "
"...in terms of ARKS management, we are still in the process of tweaking it. "
"But do be reassured. There will not be instances that will undermine you. I will not let that happen. "

"アークスの管理状況について
少しずつ落ち着いてきました。"

"ですが全ての対応を終了するには
まだ時間がかかりそうです。
もう少し、お待ちください。"

"アークスの管理状況ですが
新体制に向けての準備が
ようやく整いました。"

"今後は万全の体制で、アークスを
全面的にバックアップしていきます。"

"とはいえ、まだ始まったばかりです。
改善点など多くあるはずです。
その時は遠慮なく、言ってください。"

"浮上施設への渡航許可ですか？
規定の条件を満たしていれば
承認しております。"

"その条件は、クライアントオーダー
『適正能力審査試練・白ノ領域』
を達成する事となっております。"

"こちらのクライアントオーダーは
私が発行しておりますが"

"受注条件として、クエストの
『白ノ領域探索』が受注可能である
必要がありますのでご留意ください。"

"採掘場跡への探索許可ですか？
規定の条件を満たしていれば
承認しております。"

"その条件は、クライアントオーダー
『適正能力審査試練・海岸』
を達成する事となっております。"

"こちらのクライアントオーダーは
私が発行しておりますが"

"受注条件として、クエストの
『海岸探索』が受注可能である
必要がありますのでご留意ください。"

"新体制へ変わったことによる
問題や障害などは、特に起きてません。"

"ですが、問題が無いわけではなく
いくつか改善案や見直しは
出てきております。"

"もちろん全ての案を採用するわけでは
ありませんが、頂いた意見を参考に
より良い組織づくりを心がけています。"

"現在、起きてる問題について
アークス全体で対応をするべく
動いております。"

"公開されている以上の情報は
入っていないため、お待ちください。
情報が入り次第、必ず知らせます。"

"あと、これは貴方宛に連絡です。
あまり無理をなさらないように。
私からは以上です。"

"現在、公開されている以上の情報は
もたらされておりません。"

"せめてもう少し
進展があれば良いのですが……
お力になれず、申し訳ありません。"

"情報を含め、何か進展があり次第
すぐに連絡をします。
今しばらく、お待ちください。"

"今回、適切な情報開示により
アークス全体が共通の問題を認識し
的確な対応を取れました。"

"一人ひとりのアークスが迅速かつ
適時適切な対応を取れることは
組織にとっても理想的です。"

"より盤石な組織を形成していくためにも
積極的な情報開示は行っていきたいと
思っています。"

"シャオの持つ管理権限等の移行へ向けて
現在、準備を行っております。"

"それに伴う管理体制の調整や変更が
終わり次第、改めて連絡をします。
もう暫くお待ちください。"

"<%me>さん。
復帰、おめでとうございます。"

"総司令からの承認もおりています。
アークスとして、これまで以上の
活躍を期待しています。"

"それと……おかえりなさい。
お待ちしていましたよ。"

"復帰早々、大変なご様子。
あまり無理はなさらぬように。"

"フィリアがいつもハラハラしていて
見ていて楽しいのですが
少し可哀想でもあるので。"

"地球での任務もそうですが
難易度の高い任務や問題は
いつも貴方に任せてしまっています。"

"それだけ貴方やマトイさんの能力が
突出しているというのもありますが
もう少し改善できればと考えています。"

"できれば、もう……
コールドスリープが必要なほどの
治療は受けてほしくはないですから。"

"どうされましたか？
……ああ、クロトさんから
依頼されていた件ですね。"

"バトルアリーナでの対戦データは
多くの個人情報を含みますから
限られた者しかアクセスできません。"

"クロトさんには、後進の育成目的に限り
私達が閲覧できる情報の一部を
特別に開示しております。"

"……はい、今回の対戦結果を
クロトさんにお送りしました。
今後も、一層の活躍を期待しています。"

"ついにこの時が……
私達も全力でサポートします。"

"問題はいろいろとありますが
それはこれから考えればいいこと。
まずは、無事の帰還を喜びましょう。"

"どのような状況であろうとも
私は皆さんを支える職務に
専心するだけです。"
"Regarding the Goddess of Demise, we have made counteracting her our top priority."
"We are also reviewing our defenses for any possible deficiencies that she could have exploited to gain access to the ship."
"We are assisting Xiera with matters such as navigation and control."

"The modifications we have made to the system have turned out to be quite useful...
Though it's hardly what they were intended for."
"The temporary management system was able to operate without any issues in Xiao's absence. This is likely due to our recent organisational changes."
"Delegation of various duties and transparency improvements to information flow are in progress. Furthermore, individual ARKS are contributing by making their own individual operational decisions..."
"...In other words, our organization is evolving into a more decentralized form, more capable of supporting individual operatives."
"Regarding our management system, we will continue to operate it so that we are prepared in case Xiao is ever indisposed again."
"Our situation demands a flexible response, and we must be ready to take action in the event of Xiao's absence."
"I am glad you returned safely. Thank you for all your hard work."
"Now that we have overcome this crisis, the emergency system will likely be shut down. However, I will continue to support you."
